channel.title: CVE Feed for Scrollsequence -- Scrollsequence
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Scrollsequence -- Scrollsequence

item.title: CVE-2024-29118|2024-08-02T01:03:51.804Z -- scrollsequence -- scrollsequence
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Scrollsequence allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Scrollsequence: from n/a through 1.5.4.
